abstract: Google denies that a mysterious pattern off the coast of Africa, viewable in its Google Earth software, is evidence of the fabled lost city of Atlantis.
snippet: Google denies that a mysterious pattern off the coast of Africa, viewable in its Google Earth software, is evidence of the fabled lost city of Atlantis.
lead_paragraph: Update | 9:22 a.m.  In a followup post, Google explains what caused the grid pattern.

headline.main: Fabled City of Atlantis Spotted on Google Earth?

abstract: Antitrust scrutiny is a growing worry at Google as its market share gains accelerate.
snippet: Antitrust scrutiny is a growing worry at Google as its market share gains accelerate.
lead_paragraph: THE popularity of Google’s search engine in the United States just grows and grows. In the past three years, its market share gains have even been accelerating, making some people wonder whether the company will eventually obliterate what remains of its competition in search.

headline.main: Everyone Loves Google, Until It’s Too Big
headline.print_headline: Everyone Loves Google, Until It’s Too Big
